definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: Johnny Chan is the planner and presenter of a TV program which covers a diverse range of topics.
sentences.chinese: 陳奕文先生是一檔電視節目的籌辦者和主持人。

sentences.english: A third Writer-in-Residence programme is being organised.
sentences.chinese: 臨時市政局現正籌辦第三屆特聘作家計劃。

sentences.english: And not only in preparing for the World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 而且不僅是世界盃的籌辦工作。

sentences.english: Mr. Johnson: Bre you using you mower thellos afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 約翰遜師長教師今全國午你籌辦用割草機嗎？

sentences.english: Our college is to make arrangements for the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我們學院負責籌辦這次會議。

sentences.english: We are going to talk about the problem discussed at the last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 本人們籌辦談一談前次會上會商的問題。

sentences.english: Melbourne was the first city to hold the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 爾本是第一個城市籌辦奧運的。

sentences.english: I was getting ready for my wedding, which was scheduled for that Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我正在籌辦計劃於那個週六舉辦的我的婚禮。

sentences.english: Therefore the pope suggested the ancestor place church member committee prepares the world youth date activity.
sentences.chinese: 於是教宗建議宗座教友委員會籌辦世界青年日活動。

sentences.english: The preparation of the grass root gala has experienced a lot of challenges since its inception.
sentences.chinese: 草根春晚從籌辦開始就經歷了一系列的挑戰。

sentences.english: The ball organised by that club was a blue- blooded event.
sentences.chinese: 那個會社籌辦的這次舞會是上流社會活動。

sentences.english: We cut back our working hours, and started a small home-based business.
sentences.chinese: 我們減少了工作時間，籌辦了一個小型家庭企業。

sentences.english: I have found the training class, ready to the rest of the time to study.
sentences.chinese: 自己曾經找到啦培訓班，籌辦歇息地時間就去進修。

sentences.english: He and his colleagues have organised many high-level international conferences at the University.
sentences.chinese: 他與系內學者在校園籌辦了多個高水平國際研討會。

sentences.english: Bre you gonna live here alone?
sentences.chinese: 你籌辦一小我私人住在這搭嗎？

sentences.english: For enquiries, please contact our Conference Agent, Swire Travel Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 如有查詢，請聯絡會議籌辦商太古旅遊有限公司。

definition: to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
special administrative region/abbr. for 特別行政區|特别行政区
